mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rmres(rmresNum, startDate, endDate, roomCode, reservNum, people, userName, tel) VALUES(SEQ_RMRES.NEXTVAL,#{startDate},#{endDate}, #{roomCode},#{reservNum},#{people},#{userName},#{tel})
INSERT INTO reserv (reservNum, memberNum, signSpot) VALUES(SEQ_RESERV.NEXTVAL, #{memberNum}, #{signSpot})
